title: House Republicans aim to pay for Israel aid with cuts to IRS funds
description: Democrats want Israel and Ukraine funding to be linked together. House Republicans are proposing a standalone bill with roughly $14 billion for Israel offset with cuts to the Internal Revenue Service.

title: Can public officials block you on social media? It's up to the Supreme Court
description: The cases — from Michigan and California — echo issues raised in a now-defunct suit against then-President Donald Trump for blocking his critics on Twitter.

title: Why the urban legend of contaminated Halloween candy won't disappear
description: There is no evidence of any deaths or injuries from contaminated Halloween candy. Why are people still afraid of it?

title: Education Department punishes student loan servicer for billing mistakes
description: The department is withholding payment from its largest loan servicer as 2.5 million borrowers didn't receive timely billing statements.

title: Abortion is on the ballot in Ohio. The results could signal what's ahead for 2024
description: If approved by voters on Nov. 7, 'Issue 1' would amend Ohio's state constitution to include protections for reproductive health decisions, laying the groundwork for similar measures next year.

title: What to know about trunk-or-treating, a trick-or-treating alternative
description: Trunk-or-treating has been popular among churches, where people gather in parking lots and decorate their car trunks. Here's a rundown of how it started and how to find one nearby.

title: Open enrollment starts this week for ACA plans. Here's what's new this year
description: If you buy your own health insurance through state and federal marketplaces, 'tis the season to compare prices, change coverage, and take advantage of subsidies. Here's what to know.

title: We're spending $700 million on pet costumes in the costliest Halloween ever
description: More U.S. shoppers are buying into Halloween this year, scaring up a new spending record for costumes, decorations, candy and cute outfits for pets.

title: Why one family is joining a historic wave of Venezuelans migrating to the U.S.
description: Millions of Venezuelans have migrated to escape authoritarian rule and their country's worst economic crisis. For the first time, they're the largest group detained for entering the U.S. irregularly.

title: Illinois man charged with hate crime in fatal stabbing of Muslim boy, attack on mom
description: Joseph Czuba, 71, is charged in the fatal stabbing of 6-year-old Wadea Al-Fayoume and the wounding of his mother Hanaan Shahin on Oct. 14.
